title: Discover Australia's national parks
brief_description: Shows what to see and do in Australia’s National Parks, their location and the facilities available for visitors. This film shows Port Campbell, Wyperfeld, Mt. Buffalo and Wilson’s Promontory National Parks - all in Victoria. Narrated by Robert Raymond.
